title: EA FC 25 Ultimate Team
description: Revolutionized content strategy and player engagement for one of gaming's largest live services.
impact: Significantly enhanced player retention through data-driven content optimization

details.challenge: EA FC Ultimate Team faced declining player engagement and retention rates, with players churning after major content releases. The live service needed a comprehensive overhaul of its content strategy to maintain its position as one of gaming's most lucrative franchises.
details.role: As Content Strategy Lead, I was responsible for analyzing player behavior data, designing engagement-focused content releases, and coordinating with cross-functional teams including game design, marketing, and data science.
details.approach: Implemented a data-driven content calendar based on player psychology and engagement patterns. Developed predictive models to forecast player behavior and optimize content timing. Created A/B testing frameworks for new features and established KPIs for measuring content effectiveness.
outcomes: Increased average session time by 35% through optimized content pacing
Reduced player churn by 28% during traditionally low-engagement periods
Generated 15% increase in monetization through strategic content placement
Established new best practices adopted across other EA Sports titles
details.learnings: This project reinforced the importance of data-driven decision making in live service games. Understanding player psychology and behavior patterns is crucial for creating engaging content that resonates with the community.

title: Vote It! Democracy Game
description: Led a talented team of 7 to launch a mobile game promoting democratic engagement.
impact: 30% reduction in development time through Agile implementation

details.challenge: ARDEN needed to create an engaging mobile game that would educate young people about democracy and encourage civic participation, all while working with a limited budget and tight timeline for launch before major elections.
details.role: Project Lead and Scrum Master, responsible for team coordination, stakeholder management, technical architecture decisions, and ensuring the project's social impact goals were met.
details.approach: Implemented Agile methodologies with 2-week sprints, daily standups, and continuous stakeholder feedback. Created gamification mechanics that made learning about democracy fun and engaging. Established partnerships with educational institutions for content validation.
outcomes: Successfully launched on iOS and Android 2 months ahead of schedule
Reached 50,000+ downloads in the first month
92% positive user reviews praising educational value
Adopted by 15 schools as supplementary civic education material
Won 'Best Social Impact Game' at Mobile Gaming Awards 2024
details.learnings: Leading a diverse team taught me the importance of clear communication and adapting leadership styles to individual team members. The intersection of gaming and social impact showed me how technology can drive positive change.

title: AI Marketing Automation Suite
description: Built comprehensive automation workflows integrating ChatGPT, Gemini, and n8n for marketing optimization.
impact: Automated 70% of repetitive tasks, enabling focus on strategic initiatives

details.challenge: Small marketing teams struggle with repetitive tasks like content creation, social media scheduling, and lead nurturing. Manual processes were consuming 60% of productive time, leaving little room for strategic work.
details.role: Solo developer and architect, designing and implementing the entire automation ecosystem from concept to deployment.
details.approach: Built a modular automation system using n8n as the orchestration layer, integrating multiple AI models for different tasks. Created custom nodes for specific marketing workflows and implemented failsafes for AI hallucination prevention.
outcomes: Reduced content creation time from 4 hours to 30 minutes per piece
Automated 70% of routine marketing tasks
Generated 3x more content while maintaining quality standards
Saved $5,000/month in operational costs
Created reusable workflow templates now used by 20+ businesses
details.learnings: Working with cutting-edge AI tools taught me the importance of prompt engineering and workflow design. The key to successful automation is understanding both the technical capabilities and human needs.
details.teamSize: Solo project with feedback from 5 beta testers

title: Cross-Platform Game Development
description: Developed multiple games using Unity and Unreal Engine, from concept to market release.
impact: Successfully shipped 2 titles, mastering full development lifecycle

details.challenge: Creating commercially viable games as an independent developer requires mastering multiple disciplines - from programming and design to marketing and business development.
details.role: Lead Developer and Game Designer, handling all aspects of game development from initial concept to post-launch support.
details.approach: Adopted iterative development with regular playtesting sessions. Built modular, reusable systems for common game mechanics. Engaged with the gaming community early for feedback and built a following pre-launch.
outcomes: Published 'Neon Velocity' - a racing game with 10,000+ downloads
Released 'Shadow Tactics' - a stealth puzzle game featured on Steam's front page
Built reusable framework reducing development time by 40%
Established freelance game development service with 5 recurring clients
Created educational content helping 1,000+ aspiring developers
details.learnings: Game development taught me the importance of scope management and the value of community feedback. Technical skills are important, but understanding player psychology and market demands is crucial for success.

title: Creative Content Production
description: Produced high-quality video content, leveraging Adobe Suite and drone technology.
impact: Delivered engaging multimedia experiences across various industries

details.challenge: Clients across different industries needed compelling visual content that could cut through the noise and engage their audiences, from real estate showcases to corporate training videos.
details.role: Creative Director and Lead Editor, managing end-to-end video production from concept development to final delivery.
details.approach: Developed a streamlined production pipeline optimizing pre-production planning, shooting efficiency, and post-production workflows. Created template systems for common video types while maintaining creative flexibility.
outcomes: Produced 50+ commercial videos with average view count of 100K+
Increased client engagement rates by 65% through creative storytelling
Built portfolio serving industries from real estate to tech startups
Reduced production time by 30% through workflow optimization
Won 3 regional awards for creative excellence
details.learnings: Content production taught me that technical skills must be balanced with storytelling ability. Understanding client goals and audience psychology is as important as mastering the tools.
details.teamSize: Varied: 1-5 person crews depending on project

title: Quality Assurance Excellence
description: Ensured product quality for AAA gaming titles through comprehensive testing methodologies.
impact: Contributed to successful launches with zero critical post-release issues

details.challenge: AAA game development involves complex systems that must work flawlessly across multiple platforms. With millions of potential players, even minor bugs can significantly impact user experience and brand reputation.
details.role: Senior QA Analyst, responsible for test planning, execution, and coordinating with development teams to ensure quality standards.
details.approach: Implemented systematic testing methodologies including automated regression testing, performance profiling, and user experience validation. Created comprehensive test documentation and established best practices for bug reporting.
outcomes: Identified and helped resolve 500+ bugs before release
Achieved 0 critical bugs in post-launch for 2 major titles
Reduced testing cycle time by 25% through automation
Mentored 5 junior QA analysts who went on to senior roles
Developed testing framework adopted company-wide
details.learnings: Quality assurance taught me the importance of attention to detail and systematic thinking. The ability to see products from the user's perspective and anticipate edge cases is invaluable across all domains.
